title: FoodieExpress - MERN-Based Online Food Ordering System:
description: FoodieExpress is a full-stack food delivery platform with secure ordering, real-time admin management, and Stripe-powered payments.

title: University Course Management System:
description: The objective of the project is to make the enrollment and modification of the course list of a student easy

title: Student Performance Prediction System using Machine Learning:
description: This project was made to analize and predict the performance of a student in the upcoming tests.
